eventSummary: Gemini crypto deposits are temporarily unavailable.
Users are reporting issues with logging into their Coinbase accounts and declined refund transactions.
A new banking malware has impacted over 50,000 Android users in the US and Canada within six days.
A bank insider allegedly drained $477,000 from 12 customer accounts without authorization.
Senator Hassan is pushing for a crackdown on fraud and AI-driven scams, focusing on issues relevant to US banks and credit unions.
A user reported a strange duplicate transaction on Polygon after an ETH transfer.
